dashboard.title: System Overview

cleaner.title: Cleaner
cleaner.subtitle: Clean unnecessary files and free up disk space
cleaner.selectAtLeastOne: Please select at least one category
cleaner.scanDescription: Click the button below to scan your computer and find files that can be cleaned.

analyzer.title: Disk Analyzer
analyzer.subtitle: Find large files and detect malware

optimizer.title: System Optimizer
optimizer.subtitle: Monitor performance and manage startup programs
optimizer.tip1: Disable unnecessary startup programs to speed up boot time
optimizer.tip2: Clear browser cache regularly to improve browsing speed
optimizer.tip3: Remove old log files to free up disk space
optimizer.tip4: Run disk analysis monthly to identify large files
optimizer.tip5: Monitor memory hogs and kill unnecessary processes to free RAM
optimizer.tip6: Regularly check and manage memory-intensive applications

settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Configure Z-Cleaner preferences
settings.description: Z-Cleaner is a fast, secure system cleaner that helps you free up disk space and optimize your computer's performance.
